function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of partition in cubicles allowing direct transmission of aerosols between occupants","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High rates of positivity for sars-cov-2 aerosol exposure in air and swab samples","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 aerosol at all sampling sites, including near air outlets and in patients’ rooms","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High concentration of virus-laden aerosols near patients and downstream from patients","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 aerosol distribution indicates a potential transmission distance of 4m","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Greater contamination of icu environment compared to general wards","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of personal protective equipment and professional training for family members leading to familial cluster infections.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Widespread contamination of air and object surfaces in covid-19 wards by sars-cov-2.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the minimal infectious dose and aerosol transmission distance of sars-cov-2.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Human exposure to raccoon feces contaminated with baylisascaris procyonis eggs","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effective treatment for baylisascariasis","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of information about survival of b. procyonis eggs and disinfection techniques","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor ventilation in indoor spaces associated with increased transmission of respiratory infections.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of respiratory droplets carrying sars-cov-2 prompted by airflow generated by air-conditioning.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Aerosol transmission via central air supply or drainage system in confined spaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Guidelines for air-conditioning and ventilation systems may not adequately address the transmission mechanism of sars-cov-2, leading to ineffective measures.","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission through respiratory droplets and airborne particles","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential airborne transmission in risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 through ventilation ducts","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fecal-oral transmission of
